summary: I always thought I would only write a single Vicbourne story. It was enough to correct the story and make happen everything we had not seen in the series. But another alignment spontaneously began to appear in my head. So I started writing again. This does not yet have a fully defined argument in my head. I know where I want to go, but there are different ways of achieving the same result ... So, I welcome the reader's suggestions for the development of the story. I do not promise to include anything that can be suggested, but maybe I can integrate some things ... This story also cannot be so full of real historical events because I do not have time to research. I will have to be more superficial. This story is also harder to write than the previous one because it forces me to work contexts that bother me ... For example, I will have to have Albert in this story and he is hard to work for me. I do not know how far I will have the motivation to write ... And we have a problem: I will write in Portuguese only, which implies the use of an automatic translation tool for those who do not know the language. I know the result is not satisfactory, but I can not change that.
